info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 13 at 4:24PM EST until February 13 at 8:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches bringing storm total snow accumulations to 4 to 8 inches with localized areas in excess of 10 inches. * WHERE...Berrien County. The heaviest storm total snow accumulations across the northern and central portions of Berrien County. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on dangerous road conditions and visibilities near zero at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
